pr_title: Fixed issues causing citrine builds to stall

timeline.message:
Fixed issues causing citrine builds to stall
Speed up build times
Removed nginx/apache/redis/memcached tests which were no longer required

timeline.bodyText: This and other places you pull from github must point to a specific release or hash, they can't be a branch or master. Your framework and dependencies can't be updated automatically without a pull request to make sure they pass travis.
timeline.author: nbrady-techempower

replies.bodyText: I have pinned the dependencies and the framework source code to specific commit id's now.
replies.author: sumeetchhetri
